title: Drums, Girls and Dangerous Pie: A Novel Unit by Creativity in the Classroom
description: This is a combined literature and grammar unit that contains everything you need to teach the novel and more! Included in the unit are pre-reading, active-reading and post-reading activities with grammar lessons, literary activities, a literary terms matching quiz, a final essay test with grading rubric, and other activities just for fun!
author: Creativity in the Classroom
